column5: I know this question has been asked before, maybe someone can Archive.  I need to purchase another battery to start my Honda 15 Hp, run a small trolling moter and fishfinder.  Im not a rich man, so for the money whats  a bargain.  Im in Sask so Bass Pro is out of the question.  How is the Walmart Energizer or CT Nautilus.  Are there others to consider?  Thanks for your input.
Get the biggest Wally energizer there, about $90.  Remeber to charge after every use.
